data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Kottayam.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kottayam, Kerala, India

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Kottayam, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kottayam, Kerala, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Kottayam to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, make the church in Kottayam, Kerala, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Valan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Valan people know you.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Kottayam who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Kottayam, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kottayam, Kerala, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Kottayam
location.people_groups_list: Mukkari, Viswakarma Kallan Muppan, Arasar, Vannan Wayanad, Musari
